title: [Solhaven, Tidewater Road]
description: A mix of boats from peapod and square-sterned skiffs to broad-beamed fishing cutters lie on either side of the road, most of them resting keel upward.  Although an aged wall encloses her workyard east of the thoroughfare, the boatwright has a portable workbench set up between Tidewater and the bay and is engrossed in repairing several sprung strakes in the hull of a small pinnace by the light of several lanterns.

A mix of boats from peapod and square-sterned skiffs to broad-beamed fishing vessels lie on either side of the road, most of them resting keel upward.  Although an aged wall encloses her workyard east of the thoroughfare, the boatwright has a portable workbench set up between Tidewater and the bay and is engrossed in repairing several sprung strakes in the hull of a small pinnace close by the water's edge.
